title: Took a long break, came back and all of my profile was wiped
body: Is there anything I can do? I spent hundreds of dollars on this account (I have some legendary skins, a lot of old holiday skins, nearly every champ available til the time I left, runes galore, etc.). Pretty bummed about it.

replies.body: We don't have any way of fully resetting an account, so it's pretty likely that you're just logging into the wrong account or a different region. Double check your username and region to make sure this is the account you're looking for, and if so, hit up our account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for help finding the account you're searching for.

I went through the process of verifying my account through email. I know that I had a smurf account, but when I received the verification email based on my email address, I was only shown this login name.

I think you just might be logging in to the wrong account.  You can try this [link ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) if you need helping finding your account.
Definitely tried that already, but it only showed one login name, which was for this account.
